CustomField.formula: IF(FLOOR((EventApi__End_Date_Time__c - EventApi__Start_Date_Time__c)*24) > 9,TEXT(FLOOR((EventApi__End_Date_Time__c - EventApi__Start_Date_Time__c)*24)),"0" & TEXT(FLOOR((EventApi__End_Date_Time__c - EventApi__Start_Date_Time__c)*24))) & ":" & IF(ROUND(MOD((EventApi__Start_Date_Time__c - EventApi__End_Date_Time__c)*1440,60),0)>9,TEXT(ROUND(MOD((EventApi__End_Date_Time__c - EventApi__Start_Date_Time__c)*1440,60),0)), IF(ROUND(MOD((EventApi__End_Date_Time__c - EventApi__Start_Date_Time__c)*1440,60),0)> 9,TEXT(ROUND(MOD((EventApi__End_Date_Time__c - EventApi__Start_Date_Time__c)*1440,60),0)),"0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD((EventApi__End_Date_Time__c - EventApi__Start_Date_Time__c)*1440,60),0))))
CustomField.label: Duration
